item.title: HELP With Crystal Chest?
item.dc:creator: @Vexi Vexi
item.description:
@Vexi wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:4, topic:489952”][quote author=Vexi link=topic=608185.msg4230207#msg4230207 date=1361218257]

What’s your question?

^ My question is where Can I find this so I can change the ID’s. (below)

public static int Crystal[] = { 14484, 13362, 13358, 13360, 13355, 13354, 13352, 13350, 13348, 13346,
13462, 13738, 989, 995, 13455, 11718, 11720, 11722, 11724, 11726, 11728,
11730, 11732, 1, 31, 257, 1094, 1093, 990, 1025, 1017, 1013, 13474, 13475,
13471, 13468, 13527, 13518, 13513, 13815, 13800, 13806, 13809, 13811};

I looked And I can’t find it, These were the only files I was given.

Gyazo

Gyazo

​


[/quote]

This is not going to be in the files you’ve been given, as it’s a text file and two config files…[/quote]

Thats what I keep telling him… but he just won’t listen but thanks.
